name: Healing Potion
description: This classic of the classics will heal you a little amount of health, don't hesitate on using it

name: Medium Healing Potion
description: The medium brother of the family. Remember, you can't open it while being dead so use it!

name: Greater Healing Potion
description: This big boy can heal anything but death! And your broken love... only you can fix that one.

name: This is a test uwu
description: Testing the decorative items (also known as useless items)

name: SUPER INCREDIBLE SUPREME HEALING POTION
description: THIS REAL POTION CAN EVEN BRING YOU BACK TO LIFE.

name: Suspicious Button
description: A button of a bright red color. You can't resist the urge to press it.

name: Clown Mask
description: A clown mask you can equip! It will do nothing but make you look like a fool.

name: Weird Stick
description: Why is this not a weapon? Because is useless.

name: Wizard Hat
description: The old hat of a man who had more problems than beard hairs.

name: Glasses
description: They probably won't help you see better, but you will look better.

name: <Atk/Boost> Can
description: This drink slighlty increases your Atk permanently.

name: <Atk/Boost> Bottle
description: This drink increases your Atk permanently.

name: <Atk/Boost> Gallon
description: This drink greatly increases your Atk permanently.

name: Energy Drink 390mL
description: This drink slighlty increases your Spd permanently.

name: Energy Drink 1L
description: This drink increases your Spd permanently.

name: Energy Drink 3L
description: This drink greatly increases your Spd permanently.

name: Vitamins 150mg
description: Consuming these slighlty increases your Def permanently.

name: Vitamins 300mg
description: Consuming these increases your Def permanently.

name: Vitamins 500mg
description: Consuming these greatly increases your Def permanently.

name: Mana Drink 1spoon
description: This dose of Mana slighlty increases your Def permanently.

name: Mana Drink 2spoons
description: This dose of Mana increases your Def permanently.

name: Mana Drink 3spoons
description: This dose of Mana greatly increases your Def permanently.
